name: Proof_344 — Duck Coop Temperature & Humidity Monitoring MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents the initial environmental monitoring inside the duck coop at MaMeeFarm, recorded on 17 December 2025 at 07:48 AM (GMT+7).

The image shows a digital thermometer–hygrometer placed inside the duck shelter, positioned near bedding material. The device displays an indoor temperature of 18.0°C, an external reference temperature of 18.5°C, and relative humidity of 90%.

This record marks the beginning of systematic temperature and humidity tracking within the duck coop environment. Such data is essential for understanding animal comfort, respiratory conditions, bedding moisture, and overall livestock well-being in small-scale farming systems.

The measurement is captured under natural conditions, without climate control or artificial adjustment.
This proof is recorded as-is, following DGCP principles of ground-truth data, transparency, and temporal accuracy.
The timestamp embedded in the image provides verifiable temporal evidence and continuity within MaMeeFarm’s daily proof archive.

This proof is prepared for minting as part of the DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection on OpenSea.
